attributes.action: Make supermarkets share shopping list favourites
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For each supermarket that has an online shopping site which records "favourite purchases", make that site provide an interface to download details of those purchases. An appropriate upload interface would be sensible too.

This means that I could log into my "Supermarket A" account, download the favourites in a standard format (eg XML), log into the "Supermarket B" site and upload it there. That way, I can simply and quickly move my online shopping to a different supermarket without all the hassle of searching item by item.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
